Package control

Class ManagerScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.ManagerScreenController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class ManagerScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The ManagerScreenController class. This screen displays a preview of Customer objects and Appointment objects as well as access to add/update/delete Customers and Appointments.
    Author:
    Thomas Hood
